mapper.select:
SELECT OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,JOB_ID ,CARR_ID ,CRNT_EQP_ID ,CRNT_PORT_ID ,SRC_EQP_ID ,SRC_PORT_ID ,DEST_EQP_ID ,DEST_PORT_ID ,MOVE_STAT_CD ,PRIRT_NO ,FNL_EVNT_NM ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,EVNT_NM ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,RSN_CD ,TID ,TRNS_CM ,USE_STAT_CD FROM WN_TRANSFER_JOB
AND SITE_ID = #{pSiteId} AND JOB_ID = #{pJobId} AND CARR_ID = #{pCarrId} AND MOVE_STAT_CD = #{pMoveStatCd} AND USE_STAT_CD = #{pUseStatCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WH_TRANSFER_JOB ( OBJ_ID ,REF_OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,JOB_ID ,CARR_ID ,CRNT_EQP_ID ,CRNT_PORT_ID ,SRC_EQP_ID ,SRC_PORT_ID ,DEST_EQP_ID ,DEST_PORT_ID ,MOVE_STAT_CD ,PRIRT_NO ,FNL_EVNT_NM ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,EVNT_NM ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,RSN_CD ,TID ,TRNS_CM ,USE_STAT_CD ) SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF6') || '-' || SYS_GUID() FROM DUAL) AS OBJ_ID ,OBJ_ID AS REF_OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,JOB_ID ,CARR_ID ,CRNT_EQP_ID ,CRNT_PORT_ID ,SRC_EQP_ID ,SRC_PORT_ID ,DEST_EQP_ID ,DEST_PORT_ID ,MOVE_STAT_CD ,PRIRT_NO ,FNL_EVNT_NM ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,EVNT_NM ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,RSN_CD ,TID ,TRNS_CM ,USE_STAT_CD FROM WN_TRANSFER_JOB WHERE OBJ_ID = #{objId}
